data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Bordera, Santiago, Palacio, Edgard (2019): The Neotropical species of Clistopyga (Hymenoptera, Ichneumonidae, Pimplinae). Part IV: the C. eldae species group, with the description of three new species. Zootaxa 4564 (2): 327-346, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4564.2.2|41 occurrences
